title: Table Datasets
short-description: Create and analyze tabular data views without using SPL. Make power users more productive in creating rich data views, while making it simple for anyone to analyze data.

title: Conditional Table Formatting & Number Formatting
short-description: Set table cell coloring  determined by cell values straight from the UI. Format numbers and add units while keeping sort order.

title: Table Summaries
short-description: Summarize column totals and calculate percent breakdowns straight from the UI.

title: Dashboard Refresh
short-description: Auto-refresh dashboard elements using versatile controls.

title: Dashboard Edit Experience
short-description: Preview dashboard before saving. Use new in-page SimpleXML source code editor with inline validation to create custom dashboards.

title: Enhanced Search Assistance
short-description: Improve SPL productivity and readability in search editor, including syntax highlighting, auto-formatting, and autocomplete.

title: Search Job Manager & Inspector
short-description: Improved user experience for Search Job Manager and Job Inspector.

title: Machine Learning Toolkit
short-description: Extend platform with guided modeling environment. Assistants offer a choice of 25 popular algorithms and provide guided model creation, testing and deployment for common objectives like forecasting values, predicting fields, and detecting outliers.

title: Hadoop Data Roll
short-description: Migrate historical data to existing Hadoop deployment while retaining Splunk search functionality. Now an integrated feature of Splunk Enterprise.

title: Indexer Clustering Enhancements
short-description: Better manage Indexer Clusters through several improvements including enhanced recoverability UI.

title: Search Head Clustering Enhancements
short-description: Better manage Search Head Clusters through several improvements including a new Health Checker.

title: User Authentication
short-description: SAML support for CA SiteMinder, OneLogin, and Optimal SAML solutions. Support for Duo Security Two Factor Authentication.

title: HTTP Event Collector Improvements
short-description: Automatically extract fields from JSON payload and utilize Basic Auth.

title: Indexer Clustering Rebalance
short-description: Automatically rebalance data across all available indexers after adding new indexer to a cluster.

title: Monitoring Console - Health Check
short-description: Verify status of Splunk deployment and identify if corrective action is required.

title: Splunk Mobile App
short-description: Better manage mobile access through several enhancements, including integration with Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM) technologies like MobileIron, AirWatch, and Good Technology.

title: Removal of Metered License Enforcement
short-description: Starting with version 6.5, Splunk Enterprise no longer disables searches when you exceed your licensed data ingestion quota.

title: Personalized Dev/Test Licenses
short-description: Splunk customers can now explore new data sources and projects with free personalized Splunk Enterprise Dev/Test Licenses.

title: Custom Alert Action - Search-driven Dropdowns
short-description: Dynamic, search-driven input support for Custom Alert Actions.

title: New Developer Resources and Splunkbase App Discovery
short-description: Take advantage of the many resources available to help you build, package, certify, and promote your apps. Learn more at dev.splunk.com.

title: Add-on Builder App
short-description: Onboard your data faster using a process driven UI.
